Package arena

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Brain
    AI for players of the Paintball game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    This class is designed to be returned by the getMove method of the Brain interface.
    Base
    A Base is a subclass of Occupant which represents a team's base.
    Blocker
    A Blocker is a simple Occupant whose purpose is to block movement and shots.
    Board
    The main game board class.
    Direction
    This is a utility class consisting of helper methods which competitors may use to help them design their Brains.
    FieldPanel
    This class is a subclass of JPanel and handles the actual play area of the game (not the buttons or labels).
    Occupant
    A generic abstract class representing any piece on the Board.
    PaintballMain
    The main class for the Paintball game.
    Player
    This class represents a Player in the game.
    Sandbox
    Simple sandbox class for testing out bits of code.
    Shot
    This class is a subclass of Occupant that represents shots on the board.
